translations.translation: In whose wealth a due share is included
and those in whose wealth there is a known right
They are those who assign a certain share of their property
And those in whose wealth exists a recognised right,
And those in whose wealth there is a recognized right.
And those in whose wealth there is a fixed portion.
those in whose wealth is a right known
And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged
those who give a due share of their wealth
And those in whose riches is a known right.
and there is a known share in whose wealth
And those in whose wealth is a recognised right.
And those in whose wealth there is a known right,
who, from their wealth is a known right
And those in whose wealth is a rightful share.
And those within whose wealth is a known right
[70:24] and in whose wealth there is an acknowledged due, namely, alms,
(And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged) they acknowledge that there is in their wealth a right other than the prescribed poor-due,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلَّذِينَ فِيۤ أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ } معناه سِوى الزَّكاةِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱلَّذِينَ فِيۤ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ } المنسوبة إليهم، المسوقة لهم { حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ } [المعارج: 24] كالزكاة والصدقات المؤقتة وغير المؤقتة
